original_text: These are the waters of Meribah, where the people of Israel quarreled with the Lord, and through them he showed himself holy.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 여호와와 다투었으므로 이를 므리바 물이라 하니라 여호와께서 그들 중에서 그 거룩함을 나타내셨더라

sentences.original_text: These are the waters of Meribah
where the people of Israel quarreled with the Lord
and through them he showed himself holy
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주님은 그 물들을 통해 자신을 거룩하게 나타내셨습니다.
